mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOECO.SC_PRODUCTS(prodName, gender, sellPrice, category, material, country, regDate, updateDate, prodDiscount, prodContents, prodStock, brandCode) VALUES ( #{prodName}, #{gender}, #{sellPrice}, #{category}, #{material}, #{country}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{prodDiscount}, #{prodContents}, #{prodStock}, #{brandCode} )
